About Me

Hi I am Saahil,a Graduate Student pursuing my Master's in Information Science from the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. I'm passionate about Data Science and Software Development. My favorite past-times include wood-working, sketching and gaming. I'm enthusiastic about building better software and hope to make a career out of it!
